control.name: uart4_pty
control.doc: Pseudo-terminal (pty) thats connnected to FP MCU's uart console

control.name: ec3po_fpmcu_uart_pty
control.doc: FP MCU UART console provided via EC-3PO console interpreter.

control.name: fpmcu_ec3po_interp_connect
control.doc: State indicating if interpreter is listening to the EC UART.

control.name: uart4_baudrate
control.doc: Baudrate for FP MCU's uart console

control.name: uart4_parity
control.doc: Parity for FP MCU's uart console

control.name: uart4_sbits
control.doc: Number of stop bits for FP MCU's uart console

control.name: uart4_bits
control.doc: Number of data bits for FP MCU's uart console

control.name: fpmcu_uart_cmd
control.doc: Set to send command to FP MCU UART. Get to obtain the matched results with the regular expression of fpmcu_uart_regexp.

control.name: fpmcu_uart_multicmd
control.doc: Set to send multiple commands to FP MCU UART.

control.name: fpmcu_uart_regexp
control.doc: List of regular expressions to match the response of fpmcu_uart_cmd.

control.name: fpmcu_uart_timeout
control.doc: Timeout value for a response after issuing a command on fpmcu_uart_cmd.

control.name: fpmcu_uart_capture
control.doc: Enables capture of FP MCU console via fpmcu_uart_stream

control.name: fpmcu_uart_stream
control.doc: FP MCU console stream captured while fpmcu_uart_capture is set to 'on'

control.name: jtag_buf_en
control.doc: Enabled JTAG buffer on servo ... re-purposed to uart4.

control.name: uart4_on_flex_en
control.doc: Enables JTAG buffer on servo flex ... repurposed to uart4.
